using System;

namespace Test
{   
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            int[] list = { 4, 1, 6 };

            // 6ã€Clear(Array, Int32, Int32)
            Array.Clear(list, 1, 1);
            
            foreach (int i in list) {
                Console.WriteLine("{0}", i); // 4 0 6
            }

            // 7ã€Copy(Array, Array, Int32) 
            int[] copyList = new int[3];
            Array.Copy(list, copyList, list.Length);
            
            foreach (int i in copyList) {
                Console.WriteLine("{0}", i); // 4 0 6
            }

            // 8ã€GetLength(Int32)
            Console.WriteLine("{0}", list.GetLength(0)); // 3

            // 9ã€GetLongLength(Int32)
            Console.WriteLine("{0}", list.GetLongLength(0)); // 3

            // 10ã€GetLowerBound(Int32)
            Console.WriteLine("{0}", list.GetLowerBound(0)); // 0

            // 11ã€GetType
            Console.WriteLine("{0}", list.GetType()); // System.Int32[]

            // 12ã€GetUpperBound(Int32)
            Console.WriteLine("{0}", list.GetUpperBound(0)); // 2

            // 13ã€GetValue(Int32)
            Console.WriteLine("{0}", list.GetValue(0)); // 4

            // 14ã€IndexOf(Array, Object)
            Console.WriteLine("{0}", Array.IndexOf(list, 4)); // 0

            // 15ã€Reverse(Array)
            Array.Reverse(list);

            foreach (int i in list) {
                Console.WriteLine("{0}", i); // 6 0 4
            }

            // 16ã€SetValue(Object, Int32)
            list.SetValue(10, 0);
            Console.WriteLine("{0}", list[0]); // 10

            // 17ã€Sort(Array)
            Array.Sort(list);

            foreach (int i in list) {
                Console.WriteLine("{0}", i); // 0 4 10
            }

            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
}
